Ella es emprendedora, amable, de buen trato al cliente, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona sur de la ciudad, área residencial y muy poblada, casas antiguas y rústicas,  muchas sin acceso a servicios básicos, conviven formando un lugar de comercio y manufactura en todas las áreas. De clima cálido con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 22-32 grados centígrados. 
Rosmery es tez trigueña, cabello castaño largo lo usa amarrado, ojos pardos, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su esposo que trabaja como transportista, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía                                                                      eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de alimentos y artículos de primera necesidad como; azúcar, pan, fideo, arroz, huevo, refrescos, artículos de limpieza y otros., actividad que realiza en un cuarto que utiliza como tienda en su domicilio, todos los días de la semana durante las horas del día. “inicié mi negocio por la falta de tiendas de barrio en el sector, todo el barrio compra de mi tienda…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que no existe competencia, la desventaja es que debe andar surtida constantemente. Su sueño es abrir un micro market con más variedad de productos, ella desea realizar la compra de variedad de alimentos y productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda y cubrir las necesidades de sus clientes. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Rosmery solicita un préstamo para la compra de alimentos y artículos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda y cubrir las necesidades de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rosmery is 38 years old. She is married and does not have any children. She is entrepreneurial, kind, responsible, hardworking, and very good with her customers. Her business is a neighborhood store, from which she sells food and basic need items.

She runs her business out of the southern part of the city, a residential and highly populated area of old and rustic homes. Many of these homes do not have basic services, so people get along by forming areas of commerce and manufacturing in every neighborhood. The climate is warm and the daytime temperatures ranges between 22 and 32 degrees Centigrade.

Rosmery has an olive-skinned complexion and long dark hair which she pulls back. She has brown eyes and a robust complexion. Her native language is Guaraní which she speaks at home, and she speaks Spanish in everyday life and in business. She shares her life with her husband, who works as a driver. They live in their own home which is made out of brick and cement, with a corrugated iron roof. Their home has water, electricity and plumbing.

Her business is the sale of food, such as sugar, bread, pasta, rice, eggs and soda; as well as everyday products such as cleaning products. She sells out of a room in her home which she uses as a store. The store is open every day of the week during the daytime. 

Rosmery says, "I started my business because there was a lack of neighborhood stores in this area, and the whole neighborhood now shops at my store." The advantage of her store is that she doesn't have any competition; the disadvantage is that she must always be well-stocked. Her dream is to open a mini-market with a greater variety of products. She wants to purchase a variety of food and basic necessity products in order to stock her store and meet the needs of her customers. 

This is the first year that Rosmery has been in this business, and this is her first loan cycle with this institution. For these reasons Rosmery requests a loan to purchase food and other basic items to stock her store and to meet the needs of her clients.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is a 40-year-old married woman and a mother of a 3-year-old child from Merida, Leyte. Nenita makes a living through a hog-raising business. Nenita has been in the business for more than 23 years now. 

As of this time, she would like to take a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed. This loan will allow her to improve her hog-raising business as well as her income from it.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Agée de 70 ans, Akossiwa est une femme veuve et vit à Avenou avec ses quatre enfants. Akossiwa vend de la pate bandée accompagnée de poissons frits qui lui procure de la rentabilité pour leur survie. Akossiwa s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Akossiwa demande ce crédit pour acheter des sacs de maïs et des poissons. Akossiwa compte tirer du profit et venir en aide aux enfants dans les charges quotidiennes
texts.en: Akossiwa, aged 70, is a widow who lives in Avenou with her four children. She sells “pate bandée” served with fried fish, and this brings in profits for them to subsist. She gets her supplies three times a month at the market. Akossiwa is asking for this loan to purchase sacks of corn and fish. She plans on making a profit and helping out the children by covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 50 sacks of corn and 10 bags of fish

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is 48 years old. He is married with six children aged between 10 and 23 years. They all go to school. He is a farmer, and he has been growing maize for the past eight years, while his wife is a businesswoman. The loan from Kiva he would like to use to pay the workers who harvested maize. The profits from the business will be used to renovate his house.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to pay the workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a retail business where she sells fruits and vegetables. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located in a busy area. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables. She hopes that in the future, she will have a large-scale business. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Pheakdey's Group

texts.en:
Pheakdey, 35, lives in a rural village in the Siem Bouk district of Steng Treng province, Cambodia. To make a living, he grows cassava and soybeans. He has been in these businesses for seven years.
 
Pheakdey has been with VisionFund for two cycles. Now he is leading his group to ask for a new loan. As the leader, he wants to use his portion to pay for labor fees to operate his business. He hopes to grow healthy his rice and earn more from his healthy crops to make a better living.

loans.use: to pay for labor fees to operate his business

location.town: Steung Treng Province, Sieam Bouk District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase trim to add to her sewing supplies to resell: thread, silk, poplin

loans.name: Rina Barvarita

texts.es:
Cojimíes es un destino turístico debido a que tiene muchos atractivos naturales, está ubicado en el Cantón Pedernales, su oferta gastronómica como camarones, langostas, langostinos diversos tipos de pescados, almejas, jaibas, cangrejos, conchas y muchos más frutos del mar es deliciosa, sus habitantes se dedican a la pesca, aquí se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Zaineb.
En este lugar vive la señora Rina, tiene 38 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 21, 17 y 16 años, uno es mayor de edad e independiente y dos estudian en el colegio. El cónyuge es pescador en alta mar. Viven en casa propia.
Doña Rina es una muy  buena esposa que trata de ayudarle a su esposo con la dura carga del hogar y es para esto que ella realiza los créditos, para que él  utilice en su trabajo, él tiene una pequeña embarcación en la cual realiza las faenas de pesca, sale a alta mar en la madrugada y regresa después de dos días, una vez que ellos regresan entregan los productos que el mar les ha brindado a los comerciantes que llegan hasta las playas para llevarlos a otras ciudades. También algunas veces ellos entregan al menudeo por la zona. Ella también vende productos de catálogos como zapatos y cosméticos Avon, Esika, Yanbal (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas).
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar materiales para la pesca como combustibles, redes, piolas y alimentos para el viaje. Lleva tres  ciclos Grupo De Crédito y es la tesorera del grupo, le gusta por la ayuda que le han dado con los créditos. Su sueño es  tener una casa más cómoda y grande.
texts.en:
Cojimíes is a tourist destination that has a lot of natural attractions. It is located in the Pedernalese canton. It offers cuisine like shrimp, lobsters, different types of fish, clams, crabs, shells, and a lot more fruits of the sea. It is delicious. Its inhabitants make a living by fishing. Here the members of the Zaineb Credit Group meet. 

Rina lives in this location. She is 38 years old and has a common law marriage, from which she has three children of 21, 17, and 16 years old. One is older and independent and the other two study in high school. The husband is a high sea fisherman. They live in their own house.

Rina is a very good wife who tries to help her husband with the difficult household burden. It is for that reason that she asks for the loans, so that he can use it in his work. He has a small fishing boat in which he does fishing operations. He goes out to the high sea in the early morning and returns after two days. Once they return, they deliver the products the sea has given them to the merchants who come to the beaches to take them to other cities. Also, sometimes they deliver it to sell in the area. 

She also sells catalog products like shoes and cosmetics from Avon, Esika, and Yanbal (beauty items, makeup, perfumes, and women's accessories).

This loan will be used to buy materials for fishing like fuel, nets, ropes, and food for the trip. She has been in the Credit Group for three cycles and she is the treasurer of the group. She likes it for the help they have given her for the loans. 

Her dream is to have a more comfortable and bigger house.

loans.use: to buy fuel, nets, ropes, and food

loans.name: Teresa Del Jesús

texts.es:
Cojimíes es un destino turístico debido a que tiene muchos atractivos naturales, está ubicado en el Cantón Pedernales, su oferta gastronómica como camarones, langostas, langostinos diversos tipos de pescados, almejas, jaibas, cangrejos, conchas y muchos más frutos del mar es deliciosa, sus habitantes se dedican a la pesca, aquí se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Zaineb.
En este lugar vive la señora Teresa, tiene 43  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen  un niño de 13 años de edad estudian en la escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica de hielo.
Doña Teresa para salir adelante junto a su familia tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  ahí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 19h00 y a veces hasta más tarde,  es ella la que pasa en su negocio ya que es ahí donde le gusta estar porque además de ganarse la vida se entretiene y se informa de las novedades que pasan a sus alrededor. Tiene 19 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Este es su primer crédito y le gusta porque ha hecho más amigas en el grupo, su hermana la invito a ser parte del grupo. Su sueño es salir de viaje fuera del país ya que siempre está trabajando y no tiene vacaciones.
texts.en:
Cojimíes is a tourist destination because of its many attractive natural areas. It is located in the canton of Padernales and its cuisine - such as shrimp, lobsters, clams, crabs, crayfish and a variety of other fish and shellfish - is delicious. Its inhabitants are fishermen. The members of the loan group "Zaineb" meet in Cojimíes.

Teresa, who is 43 years old, lives in Cojimíes. She is married, and she and her husband have one son who is 13 years old and is in school. Her husband works in an ice factory. Teresa, in order to get her family ahead, runs a convenience store from her home, where she sells all sorts of products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergent, legumes, vegetables and fruits. She works every day of the week from 6 a.m. until 7 p.m., and occasionally even later than that. She is the one who looks after the store and she likes to be there because, in addition to earning a living, she is kept entertained and informed by what is going on around her.

She has had this business for 19 years, and it is going well for her. She will use this loan to stock her store. She will purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergent, lunch meat and other everyday products. This is her first loan, and she likes it because she has made friends in this group, which she was invited to join by her sister.

Teresa's dream is to go on vacation somewhere outside of the country, because she is always working and she never gets to take a vacation.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergent, cold cuts and other basic consumer goods.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: Humberto es un hombre de 33 años es casado, este humilde hombre agradece profundamente  por el apoyo con el primer crédito, pues su vida fue muy beneficiada, porque logro comprar sus cuerdas de cebolla con la que obtuvo mejores ganancias con el que logro comprar un terreno, él ahora solicita un nuevo préstamo que lo invertirá comprando sus insumos agrícolas como abono orgánico, fungicidas y sus semillas para realizar su cultivo de la temporada. Humberto tiene las esperanzas de conseguir nuevamente el crédito para que su vida siga prosperando.
texts.en:
Humberto is a 33-year-old married man. This humble man profoundly appreciates the support with the first loan since his life benefitted from it because he was able to buy the onions with which he obtain better income. With that he bought a plot of land. 

Now he is asking for a new loan which he will invest in buying agricultural inputs like organic fertilizer, fungicides, and his seeds to grow this season. Humberto has hopes of getting the loan again so that his life can continue prospering.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer, fungicides, and seeds

loans.name: Roukiya

texts.fr: Roukiya est une femme mariée et âgée de 32 ans vit à Adidogomé avec ses quatre enfants. Roukiya s’évertue de mettre à disposition de son ménage sa contribution pour son épanouissement. C’est en cela que Roukiya vend des oignons dans le quartier et trouve une satisfaction du profit qu’elle tire. Roukiya s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Dans le souci de répondre favorablement aux besoins de ses consommateurs, Roukiya nécessite ce crédit pour acheter des oignons d’augmenter sa rentabilité
texts.en: Roukiya is a married woman, aged 32, who lives in Adidogomé with her four children. She does all she can to provide for her household for it to thrive. To do so, Roukiya sells onions in her neighborhood and finds satisfaction in the profit she earns. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. Concerned about responding favorable to the needs of her consumers, Roukiya needs this loan to purchase onions to increase he profitability.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of onions

loans.name: Mama

texts.fr: Mama vit à Kodjoviakopé et est âgée de 39 ans, elle est une femme mariée avec cinq personnes à charge. Mama vend des tomates fraiches et des condiments dans le quartier et au marché et trouve son bénéfice grâce à son dynamisme. Mama s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché. Pour commander quelque  tomates fraiches, Mama demande ce crédit pour réaliser son achat et tirer le profit nécessaire pour aider son mari dans les diverses charges de la famille.
texts.en: Mama lives in Kodjoviakopé and is 39 years old. A married woman with five persons to support, she sells fresh tomatoes and condiments in the neighborhood and at the market. Mama makes her profit due to her energy. She gets her supplies four times a month at the market. To put in an order for a few fresh tomatoes, she is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and to make the profit necessary to help her husband to cover the family’s diverse expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a few fresh tomatoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy material for vehicle painting.

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr:
Monsieur Abdoulaye est vigile à l’IMCEC depuis maintenant 5 ans et s’active aussi dans le transport depuis bien avant cela. Il n’a pas de véhicule, mais de son temps libre, des chauffeurs peuvent lui remettre leur véhicule pour qu’il en tire sa dépense quotidienne. Dépense qu’il partage avec un de ses frères qui vit avec lui dans la maison familiale. Abdoulaye est mariée et père de 4 enfants dont son ainé à 8 ans.
Le crédit qu’il sollicite est destiné à l’achat de zincs dont il a besoin pour effectuer quelques réfections dans la maison.
Le souhait d’Abdoulaye est d’avoir son propre véhicule.
texts.en:
Mr. Abdoulaye has been the watchman at IMCEC for five years now, as well as in the transportation sector for much longer. He has no vehicle, but in his spare time, drivers can lend him their vehicle, so he earns his daily living from it. Expenses are covered with one of his brothers, who lives with him in their parents’ house. Abdoulaye is married and the father of four, including his oldest, who is 8 years old. 

The loan he is requesting is for purchasing sheet metal roofing material he needs to carry out a few home improvements. His wish is to have his own vehicle.

loans.use: to carry out some renovation work on his house

loans.name: Rogelia Cleotilde

texts.es:
Cojimíes es un destino turístico debido a que tiene muchos atractivos naturales, está ubicado en el Cantón Pedernales, su oferta gastronómica como camarones, langostas, langostinos diversos tipos de pescados, almejas, jaibas, cangrejos, conchas y muchos más frutos del mar es deliciosa, sus habitantes se dedican a la pesca, aquí se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Zaineb.
En este lugar vive la señora Rogelia, tiene 30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de ocho años el mismo que estudia en escuela. El cónyuge es vendedor de alimento para camarones y lo hace recorriendo por todas las camaroneras, viven en casa propia.
Doña Rogelia es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa por catálogo, productos de Yanbal y Taperware (productos plásticos como vasos, recipientes para microondas). Trabaja tres días a la semana de tres a cuatro horas al día, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene cinco años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien. 
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y labiales. Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace cuatro años aproximadamente, es la secretaria del grupo y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer. Su sueño es ser una gran empresaria de los productos que vende.
texts.en:
Cojimíes is a tourist destination that has a lot of natural attractions. It is located in the Pedernalese canton. It offers cuisine like shrimp, lobsters, different types of fish, clams, crabs, shells, and a lot more fruits of the sea. It is delicious. Its inhabitants make a living by fishing. Here the members of the Zaineb Credit Group meet.

Rogelia lives in this place. She is 30 years old and is in a common law marriage, from which she has one 8-year-old son who is in school. The husband is a shrimp food vendor, and he travels to all of the shrimp farms. They live in their own house.

Rogelia is a stay-at-home mom who, in order to earn her own means to help her husband pay the household costs, dedicates herself to selling catalog clothes, products from Yanbal and Taperware (plastic products like cups, containers for the microwave). She works three days a week between three and four hours a day. She sells her products on credit and gets paid every 8 days. She has been doing this work for five years, and it is going very well.

This loan is to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and lipsticks. She has been in the Credit Group for about four years. She is the secretary of the group, and she likes it because the payments are easy to make. Her dream is to be a great businesswoman of the products she sells.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and lipsticks.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en:
Herminia is a 54-year-old resident of Quezon City, Philippines and she is married to Cruz. They manage their household while operating the business. They work hard for their children and to provide income for their everyday needs.

Herminia maintains a direct selling business. She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics and other products through the popular direct selling brands like Avon, Natasha, Boardwalk, and other direct selling brands. A customers order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. Dealer’s prices are lower than those in the catalogue, and these are the profits that dealers are investing on as their income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 2,000 in sales every week.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy additional supplies and merchandise products like shampoo, cologne, deodorant, perfume, soap, fabric softener, undergarments and other products needed in her business. 

Herminia dreams of expanding her business more and hopes to give her family a better future. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To buy additional supplies and merchandise like shampoo, cologne, deodorant, perfume, soap, fabric softener, undergarments and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase construction materials to make roofs for some rooms in his house as well as to renovate them

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Martha is a Kiva borrower. She has one child. She describes herself to be ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells mangoes. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her primary customers are individuals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of mangoes. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of mangoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics and peanut paste to resell.

loans.name: Nongtaaba De Bazoule Group

texts.fr:
Mr OUMAROU  est responsable du groupe NONGTAABA DE BAZOULE.  Il  est marié et père de 10 enfants. Le plus âgé a 23  ans et le moins âgé a  02 ans. 04 enfants vont à l’école et il a 10 personnes en charge.
Monsieur vend des légumes  depuis 10 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les  marchés  environnants.
Avec l’argent octroyé, il compte acheter 04 sacs de choux et 02 caisses  de tomates.
Il   veut utiliser les  bénéfices du prêt pour aider sa famille et payer la scolarité de ses enfants. Il ambitionne agrandir son activité et aller dans les villages éloignés.
texts.en:
Oumarou is the leader of the NONGTAABA DE BAZOULE group. He is married and the father of ten children. The eldest is 23 and the youngest 2 years old. Four of his children attend school and in total ten people are financially dependent on him. He has sold vegetables for the last ten years. He buys his supplies in the neighbouring markets. With the loan funds, he plans to buy four sacks of cabbage and two crates of tomatoes.
He wants to use the profits of the loan to help his family and to pay for the childrens' education. He has plans to grow his business and to branch out into villages further away.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of cabbage and two crates of tomatoes.

loans.name: Clara Annabel

texts.es:
Cojimíes es un destino turístico debido a que tiene muchos atractivos naturales, está ubicado en el Cantón Pedernales, su oferta gastronómica como camarones, langostas, langostinos diversos tipos de pescados, almejas, jaibas, cangrejos, conchas y muchos más frutos del mar es deliciosa, sus habitantes se dedican a la pesca, aquí se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Zaineb.
En este lugar vive la señora Clara,  tiene 32  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 2 hijas de 8 y 3  años de edad, la mayor estudia en la escuela. Su esposo es pescador. Tienen casa propia.
Doña Clara para salir adelante junto a su familia tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  ahí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 19h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su esposo le ayuda  cuando está desocupado. Tiene cinco años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Grupo De Crédito  hace tres ciclos y le gusta porque ha hecho más amigas en el grupo y por los créditos emergentes. Su meta es poner una boutique y vender zapatos al por mayor en Pedernales.
texts.en: Cojimies is a tourist destination due to its many natural attractions. It's located in the Pedernales canton, and its culinary offerings are shrimp, lobster, prawns, various types of fish, clams, blue crabs, crabs, seashells and many other delicious things from the sea. The residents work in fishing, and it's in this location that the members of the Zaineb loan group meet. Clara lives here, and is 32 years old, married and has 2 daughters ages 8 and 3 from this marriage. The elder daughter attends school. Her husband is a fisherman and they have a house of their own. To support her family Clara has a grocery store in her home where she sells all types of goods such as rice, sugar, oil, detergent, legumes, vegetables and fruit. She works every day from 6:00 to 19:00 and sometimes later. Her husband helps her when he's available. She's done this job for five years and it's going well for her. She'll use this loan to stock her store, she's going to purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergent, cold cuts, and other essential products. She's been in the loan group for three seasons and she likes it because she has made more friends in the group and because of the growing loans. Her goal is to set up a boutique and sell shoes wholesale in Pedernales.

loans.use: To purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cold cuts, and other essential products.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
San Cayetano está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, y forman parte de ese programa.
La Sra. Liz se dedica a la venta de comestibles que ella hace, trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día, haciendo las comidas que después sale a vender de manera ambulante, es una persona muy trabajadora que quiere crecer y dar a su familia una vida digna.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser hortalizas, verduras, carne, pollo y otros, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y trabajando por ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
“San Cayetano” is a group that is in its second loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. All of them are working and helping one another so that they can get ahead. They have taken the poverty elimination survey as part of participating in the program.

Sra. Liz sells food that she prepares herself. She works every day, starting in the early morning hours. Liz prepares the food and then goes out to sell as a street vendor. She is a hardworking person who wants to grow and provide a decent life for her family.

Liz is requesting a loan so that she can invest in supplies for preparing her dishes such as greens, vegetables, meat, chicken, and other items so that she can continue her sales. She is grateful for the opportunity she has received so that she can continue growing and working to help her family.

loans.use: to buy greens, vegetables, meat, chicken, and other ingredients.

loans.name: María Ercilia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Dinámicas, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 69 años de edad, hace varios años su querido esposo falleció pero de esa relación tienen  3  hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, dos viven en su casa.
Doña María es una mujer que le toca trabajar duro para así ganarse la vida y no depender de nadie, ella  tiene una papelería y librería,  allí trabaja todos los días con la ayuda de sus hijos quienes también ganan su sustento diario ya que es un negocio el cual comparten en familia, los meses más altos para las ventas es cuando inician el año lectivo ya que son muchas las personas que buscan su local para comprar las listas de útiles y esto porque ella les ofrece una gran variedad de productos y a muy buen precio, son 15 años que llevan trabajando para el bien den su familia y gracias a los créditos que reciben ellos pueden salir adelante por lo cual están muy agradecidos.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar todo tipo de útiles escolares y libros para surtir su negocio. Lleva más de 15 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos son de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños son seguir adelante.
texts.en: In the city of Tosagua the lending group Dinamicas meets every two weeks. This area is known for being very dynamic and the majority of its inhabitants work in agriculture and animal breeding, as it's a place with lots of vegetation. Maria lives here, she's 69 years old, and several years ago her beloved husband passed away. But that relationship gave her 3 children who are now adults, two of them live in her home. Maria is a woman whose lot in life is to work hard so she can make a living and not have to depend on anybody. She has a stationery store and a library, and works there every day with the assistance of her children who also earn their daily bread since it's a business that the family shares. The busiest sales month is when the school year starts because many people look for her business to buy their lists of school supplies, and this is because she offers a great variety of products at a very good price. They've been working for 15 years for the sake of the family and thanks to the loans they receive they're able to pull through, for which they're very grateful.This loan will be used to buy all kinds of school supplies and books to stock her business. He's been in the loan group for over 15 years and he looks it because the loans are a big help. His dream is to keep moving forward.

loans.use: To purchase school supplies and books.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Dinara

texts.ru: Динара успешно погасила свой кредит, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. Динара вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 бычков для откорма и реализации, но уже в рамках группы "Ай-Сезим", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их трое. В хозяйстве на сегодняшний день есть нетель и лошадь. На 1,0 Га арендованной и 0,90 Га собственной земельной доли Динара выращивает фасоль. Доходы от кредита Динара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса и хочет накопить на строительство дома.
texts.en: Dinara successfully repaid her loan and is grateful to the Kiva Fund and everyone, who had helped her with the financing. Dinara once again came to the Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy 3 bulls for fattening up and resale, but this time as a member of a group Ay-Sezim that, besides her, consists of two more people, with three of them all together. Today, she has a heifer and horse on her farm. Dinara also grows beans on 1.0 hectare of leased and 0.90 hectares of own land. Dinara plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further growing her business and wants to save money to build a house.

loans.use: to buy 3 bulls for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Graciela Fernanda

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Dinámicas, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Graciela, tiene 37 años de edad, está divorciada pero de esa relación tienen una hija de  16 años de edad la misma que estudia en colegio.
Doña Graciela es una mujer muy trabajadora que para lograr sus ingresos y salir adelante se dedica al comercio,  ella vende ropa de todo tipo, interiores y zapatos por catalogo, ella sale a vender puerta a puerta casi todos los días aunque la mayor cantidad de ventas las realiza los fines de semana, en esos días ella instala un pequeño puesto en el centro de la ciudad ya que son las ferias del cantón y salen de los campos muchas personas que compran en su local. Tiene más de 10 años que se dedican a esta actividad con la cual saca adelante a su hija, ella agradece a la institución y a las personas que hacen posible que pueda recibir los créditos ya que es su forma de trabajar y salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, blusas, camisetas, ropa interior y zapatos ya que tiene varios pedidos. Lleva 8 años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor a su hija.
texts.en:
The Grupo De Credito Dinamicas (Dynamic Credit Group) meets every fifteen days in the city of Tosagua. This place, where the majority of its inhabitants work raising animals and in agriculture, is known for being very dynamic and for being an area with great vegetation.

Graciela lives in this place. She is 37 years old and divorced but from that relationship, has a 16 year old daughter who studies in high school.

Graciela is a hard working woman who works in sales to earn her income and to get ahead. She sells all types of clothing, undergarments and shoes by catalog. She goes out selling door to door nearly every day even though she makes most of her sales on weekends. On those days, she sets up a small stand in the city center since those are the neighborhood markets and many people who buy from her shop come from the countryside. She has been working for more than 10 years in this business with which she gets her daughter ahead. 

She thanks the institution and the people who make it possible for her to receive the loans since it is her way of working and getting ahead.

This loan is to buy pants, blouses, shirts, undergarments and shoes since she has many orders. She has been with the credit group for 8 years and likes it because the loans help her a lot. Her dream is the best for her daughter.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shirts, undergarments and shoes.

loans.name: Yahya

texts.en:
Yahya is a 25-year-old married man from Dier Al-Balah city. He lives with his wife and three kids in a simple house. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income and he also works at transferring goods for the traders using his rickshaw. It is a good business and provides him with a good income.

Yahya took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new rickshaw instead of the old one. This will help him to improve his business and increase his income. 

Yahya appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw to replace the old one

loans.name: Martha Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Dinámicas, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive doña Martha, tiene 42 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene  dos hijos de 20 y 16  años de edad, la menor estudia en colegio. Su marido es comerciante. 
La señora Martha es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gusta ganarse lo suyo y así con sus ingresos ayudar con los gastos que generan el estudio de su hija y los gastos del hogar, para esto ella trabaja todos los días en una  tienda de víveres que tiene en su casa,  allí vende todo tipo de productos como granos, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, frutas,  helados y varios artículos de bazar, ella aprovecha los créditos que recibe del grupo para ir aumentando la variedad de productos ya que así gana cada vez más clientes porque ellos allí encuentran de todo y a muy  buen precio , ella agradece a la institución y a quienes hacen posible estos créditos que la han ayudado en estos años.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar mayor variedad de productos de primera necesidad. Lleva 2 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le dan en el grupo. Sus sueños es que su hija sea profesional por lo cual lucha día a día.
texts.en: In the city of Tosagua the loan group Dinamicas meets every two weeks. This area is known for being very dynamic and the majority of its inhabitants work in agriculture and animal breeding, since it's a place with heavy vegetation. Martha lives here, she's 42 years old, and maintaining a common-law marriage from which she has sons ages 16 and 20. The younger child is attending high school. Her husband is a salesman and Martha is a very hard-working woman who likes to earn her keep and use the income to help with her daughter's school expenses and household expenses. For this reason she works every day in a grocery store at her home, where she sells all types of goods such as grains, oil, detergent, legumes, fruit, ice cream, and various market items. She takes advantage of the loans she receives from the group to increase the variety of products and that way keep winning over more customers because they can find anything and at a very good price. She's grateful to the institution and to the people that make these loans possible and have helped her these past few years. She will use this loan to stock her store further, by purchasing a larger variety of essential products. She's been in the loan group for two years and she likes it because of the support that she always receives in the group. Her dream is for her daughter to becomes a professional and she works for this every day,

loans.use: Comprar productos de primera necesidad.

loans.name: Soraya María Catalina

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Dinámicas, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Soraya, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, el menor estudian en universidad y es quien aun vive con ella. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Soraya es una mujer que le gusta ganarse algo por su cuenta y sentirse independiente y a la vez contribuir con los gastos que genera el hogar, para esto ella se dedican al comercio, ella vende ropa y zapatos por catálogos, su forma de ventas es puerta a puerta, lleva más de  15 años dedicada al comercio lo cual es algo que le encanta realizar.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa y zapatos. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son de gran ayuda para su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
In the city of Tosagua the DInamicas loan group meets once every two weeks. This location is known for its dynamism and the majority of its residents work in agriculture and animal breeding because it's a place with heavy vegetation. Soraya lives here, she's 43 years old, married and has three older children from that marriage. The youngest is a student at the university and still lives with her. Her husband is a salesperson.
Soraya is a woman who likes to earn her own keep and feel independent while at the same time helping with household expenses. For this reason they work in sales. She sells clothes and shoes by catalogue and her sales method is door-to-door. She's worked in this business for over 15 years and it's a job that she loves doing. This loan is to purchase clothes and shoes. Since the beginning with the loan group she has enjoyed it because the loans are a big help for her business. Her dream is to provide her family with the best.

loans.use: To purchase clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Элмира успешно погасила свой кредит, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании.  Элмира достигла хороших успехов в своем бизнесе. В хозяйстве есть корова и лошадь. Также есть земельные наделы,0,60 Га арендованной земли и 0,30 Га собственной, где она выращивает фасоль для реализации. Элмира обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого молока. Элмира является лидером группы "Ай-Сезим", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека. В будущем доходы от кредита позволят ей развить бизнес и увеличить площадь орошаемых земель.
texts.en: Elmira successfully repaid her loan and is grateful to the Kiva Fund and everyone, who had helped her with the financing. Elmira achieved good resullts in her business. She has a cow and a horse on her farm. She also has 0.60 hectares of leased and 0.30 hectares of own land, where she grows beans for sale. Elmira requested a loan in the amount of 55,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy a dairy cow in order to increase the sales volume of ecologically clean milk. Elmira is the leader of the Ay-Sezim group that, besides her, consists of two more people. In the future, the earnings from the loan will allow her to develop her business and increase the the size of irrigated land.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to increase the sales volume of ecologically clean milk

loans.name: Kenjebubu

texts.ru: Кенжебубу успешно погасила свой кредит, она очень благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. Доходы от кредита позволили ей арендовать дополнительный магазин. На сегодняшний день в обороте есть товар на суммму 170,000 сом (KGS). Она вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение ассортимента овощей. Доходы от кредита Кенжебубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение развитие бизнеса, она мечтает приобрести собственное помещение для магазина.
texts.en: Kenjebubu successfully repaid her loan and is very grateful to the Kiva Fund and everyone, who had helped her with the financing. The earnings from the loan allowed her to lease an additional store. Today, she has a goods turnover of 170,000 som (KGS). She once again requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to increase her selection of vegetables. Kenjebubu plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further developing her business and dreams of buying her own space for a store.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale in order to increase her product selection

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: transfer ownership of a public transportation vehicle

loans.name: Maria Antonieta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMANECER 15 DE AGOSTO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Maria Antonieta se dedica al trabajo de limpieza en una casa,la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es tener un negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar un televisor para su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “Amanecer 15 de Agosto” [August 15 Sunrise]. The bank is located in the Santa Ana district, belonging to the La Convención province and the department of Cusco.

The member Maria Antonieta works cleaning a home. The member is a hard working woman who gets her family ahead with this work. The member works from 8:00am until 5:00pm. The member’s dream is to have a grocery store business. 

The member requests a loan to buy a television for her home. The member is happy for the loan and is committed to fulfilling her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy a television for her home.

loans.name: Arnulfo Geremias

texts.es: Arnulfo tiene 45 años de edad, tiene una hija de 20 años de edad, Arnulfo vive en el campo al igual que su hija  y comenta que el  se dedica a la crianza de animales y  a la agricultura, Arnulfo necesita el dinero del crédito para la compra de una vaca ya que comenta que con el ingreso de la venta de la leche es como puede pagar los estudios de su hija que termino la secundaria y que desea entrar a la universidad, la aspiración de Arnulfo es de  seguir trabajando mejora su negocio y asi tener los ingresos para la educación de su única hija.
texts.en:
Arnulfo is 45 years old and has a 20 year old daughter. Arnulfo lives in the countryside, as does his daughter, and says that he works raising animals and in agriculture. 

Arnulfo needs the money from the loan to buy a cow. He says that with the income from selling the milk he can pay for his daughter’s schooling, since she finished high school and wishes to enter a university. Arnulfo’s desire is to continue working, improve his business and in that way, have the income for his only daughter’s education.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Mariela Tatiana

texts.es: Tatiana es madre soltera, tiene 22 años de edad, su hijo tiene 3 años y  va  a entrar a la escuela, Tatiana vive con sus padres y con su hijo, Tatiana se dedica a la agricultura  y a la ganadería, comenta que ella vive  en el campo y que sus padres le enseñaron al buen cuidado de sus animales, Tatiana va a invertir el crédito en la compra de una vaca ya que ella se dedica netamente al ordeño de las vacas y de ahí es como tiene sus ingresos para el bienestar de su hijo.
texts.en: Tatiana is a single, 22 year old mother. Her son is 3 years old and is going to start school. Tatiana lives with her parents and her son, and she works in agriculture and cattle-raising. She states that she lives in a rural area and that her parents taught her proper animal care. Tatiana is going to invest the loan in the purchase of a cow since she works exclusively in cow-milking and that's where she gets the income to take care of her son.

loans.use: To purchase a cow.

loans.name: Maria Cordolita

texts.es: A sus 60 años de edad Maria es madre soltera, su hija tiene  19 años, Maria se dedica a la crianza de animales, Maria vive en la campo y comenta que por medio del ordeño y venta de leche es como puede  tener sus recursos para todos sus gastos diarios, Maria necesita el dinero del crédito para invertir en la compra de vaconas y su aspiración es de comprar mas vaconas y mejorar sus ingresos para cubrir los gastos de educación de su hija.
texts.en: At the age of 60 Maria is the single mother of a 19 year old daughter. Maria works in animal raising, lives in a rural area, and states that milking cows and selling milk is the way she's able to get the resources to cover her daily expenses. Maria needs a loan to invest in the purchase of cows and her goal is purchase more cows and improve her income to be able to cover her daughter's school expenses.

loans.use: To purchase cows.

loans.name: En Dios Confiamos Group

texts.es:
July, es una mujer muy emprendedora y dinámica de 26 años de edad. vive en una población muy vulnerable de la Provincia de Esmeraldas, vive en una pequeña casa rentada con su esposo y sus 2 hijas (5 y 2 años)
Su esposo se dedica al cultivo, compra y venta de cacao; July tiene idea de constituir su negocio con una papelería, pero el capital asignado en este crédito no le alcanza, por esta razón, July iniciará  con la cría y venta de pollos, con las ganancias podrá ahorrar y de esta forma poder cristalizar su sueño de poner la papelería. 
July se describe como una mujer trabajadora con ganas de superación. Este es su primer crédito y está muy segura de lograr su sueño.
texts.en: July is a dynamic and very enterprising 26 year old woman. She lives in a very vulnerable community in the province of Esmeraldas, in a small rented house with her husband and 2 daughters (5 and 2 years old). Her husband works in the growing, buying and selling of cacao;  July has the idea of starting  a business with a stationery store, but the capital provided by this loan would not be enough so for this reason she's going to start with raising and selling chicks, and save up the profits so she can make her dream of a stationery store a reality. July describes herself as a hard-working woman with desires to improve herself. This is her first loan and she's very certain about achieving her dream.

loans.use: To purchase poultry (small chicks), vitamins, and balanced feed.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian, de 58 años de edad, está soltera y vive con sus hijos, es muy reconocida y respetada en su comunidad, por ser muy trabajadora.

Mirian, es ama de casa, pero también se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías, ella hace escapularios, camándulas y reliquias religiosas.- Las elabora y las vende al por mayor a sus clientes, los cuales llegan a su casa a recoger los pedidos.

Mirian, necesita el crédito para poder comprar madera, pintura y herramientas para la elaboración de sus artesanías.

Ella desea seguir trabajando y continuar elaborando artesanías y además, quiere que sus hijos también aprendan a elaborarlas, con el amor que ella lo hace.
texts.en:
Mirian is 58 years old, single, and lives with her children. She's very well-known and respected in her community because of her work ethic.

Mirian is a housewife but she also works in the making of artisanal crafts, making scapulars, rosaries, and religious offerings. She makes and sells them wholesale to her customers, who arrive at her home to pick up the orders.

Mirian needs to a loan to purchase wood, paint, and tools to make her artisanal crafts.

She wishes to continue working and making artisanal crafts and moreover wants her children to learn how to make artisanal crafts with the same love that she does.

loans.use: To purchase wood, paint, and tools to make artisanal crafts.

loans.name: Miryan

texts.es:
Miryan es de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso, esta estudiando la carrera de enfermería, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y ello le permitió poder seguir con sus estudios, y luchar para poder ser alguien en la vida y poder ayudar a las personas.
Hoy ella pide de nuevo este préstamo para poder volver a pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder estar mas cerca de cumplir con su meta como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Miryan is from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso. She is studying for a degree in Nursing. Miryan says that her previous loan was used to pay her degree fees. This allowed her to continue her studies as she strives to make something of her life so that she can help people.

Today Miryan is requesting a new loan so that she can pay her degree fees once again. This will help her to get closer to her goal just as before.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Gabriel Ángel

texts.es:
Gabriel, de 54 años de edad, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y tiene 7 hijos, que están estudiando.

Gabriel, ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura, de la realización de esta actividad a logrado llevar el sustento a su familia.

Gabriel, necesita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes y veneno para comenzar a preparar la tierra en donde sembrará, porque ya se acerca la temporada.

Gabriel, desea seguir trabajando para darle a sus hijos, un estilo de vida mucho mejor al que él tuvo en su infancia.
texts.en:
Gabriel is 54 years old, in a relationship, his partner is a housewife and he has 7 children who are in school.

Gabriel has dedicated his whole life to farming, and through carrying out this task he has managed to support his family.

Gabriel needs a loan to purchase fertilizer and pesticide to start to prepare the soil where he'll be planting, because the season is approaching.

Gabriel wishes to continue working to provide his kids with a standard of living much better than what he had as a child.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and pesticide to start preparing the soil where he'll be planting, because the season is approaching

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase concentrate to feed his pigs, fatten them, and then sell them for a good price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow so as to supply milk to her customers, increase her income and be able to educate her children.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es:
Abel tiene 24 años de edad, de estado civil casado, vive con su esposa y su hijo en el distrito de Querocotillo que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, la población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de café de variedad Catimore. Cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. El presente crédito lo utilizará para invertir en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su terreno cultivable. Con esto Abel espera obtener mayores ganancias para mejorar su condición económica y por ende invertir en mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Abel is 24 years old, he is married and lives with his wife and their son in the Querocotillo district, which is located in the Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in this district is quiet and the population mainly works in agriculture and cattle raising.

Abel works in agriculture. He has coffee crops of the Catimore variety. He has a lot of experience in this business and good personal and work references from the people of his district.

He will use the loan to invest it in the purchase of manure and fertilizers to maintain his farmland. By this, Abel expects to obtain higher profits in order to improve his economic situation, and, eventually, to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to invest it in the purchase of manure and fertilizers to maintain his farmland.

loans.name: María Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca, de 62 años de edad, está soltera y solo tiene una hija, que ya es mayor de edad y vive con ella y le ayuda en su negocio.

Blanca, se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, es comerciante informal, viaja todos los días a diferentes lugares para vender sus productos.

Blanca, necesita el préstamo para poder comprar mercancía para su negocio, ella desea incrementar sus ventas y conseguir más clientes para vender más y obtener más ingresos.

Blanca, sueña con ampliar mas su negocio, ella quiere en un futuro establecer su negocio en un local o en su casa, pero de una manera que sea más atractivo para sus clientes y ofrecerles ropa de marca y mucha más variedad.
texts.en:
Blanca is 62 years old, single, and has an adult daughter who lives with her and helps her with the business.

Blanca works selling clothes for women, men, and children. She's an informal salesperson who travels every day to different places to sell her products.

Blanca needs a loan to be able to purchase merchandise for her business, as she wants to boost her sales and pick up more customers so she can sell more and obtain more income.

Blanca dreams of expanding her business, and in the future wants to set up her business in a store or at her home in a way that's more appealing to her customers, and sell them brand-name clothing and have a larger selection.

loans.use: To be able to purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
El Comité Mujeres Luchadoras  se  encuentra en el 1er ciclo, están iniciando con muchas expectativas que quieren invertir para poder tener más ingresos en la casa y así  poder salir de la pobreza. 
Edith es una de las integrantes, es la presidenta, una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que quiere poder ayudar a sus seres queridos en todo lo que ellos necesitan. Edith se dedica a la venta de ropas, es una mujer muy buena en lo que hace, es por ello que se va muy bien y ya tiene muy buena clientela.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de remeras, jeans, camisas, pantalones y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas, y con ello poder luchar por sus sueños y sus metas de crecer.
texts.en:
The committee named “Mujeres Luchadoras” (Determined Women) is in its first loan cycle. The members are starting out with many expectations. They want to invest so that they can have more household income and overcome poverty.

Edith is one of the members who serves as the president. She is a hardworking and enterprising person who wants to help her loved ones with everything that they need. Edith sells clothes and is very good at what she does. For this reason, she has been successful at building up a very good clientele.

Edith is requesting a loan in order to buy T-shirts, jeans, shirts, trousers, and other garments so that she can continue her sales. As a result, she can grow and strive toward her dreams and goals.

loans.use: to buy T-shirts, jeans, shirts, trousers, and other garments to sell.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge esta estudiando la carrera de Derecho, este es su ultimo año, con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación esta terminando y llegando a su meta, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en pagar las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda en cumplir con su meta.
Es una persona que se esta esforzando cada día para ser alguien en la vida, hoy pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, ya que tendrá que cubrir ese gasto.
texts.en:
Jorge is in his final year of study toward a law degree. He is finishing with great effort and dedication so that he can reach his goal. Jorge says that his previous loan was used to pay his degree fees, which was a great help in allowing him to reach his goal.

He is a person who strives each day to make something out of his life. Today Jorge is requesting a loan in order to cover his degree expenses. The money will allow him to meet this obligation.

loans.use: to pay his degree expenses.

loans.name: Gloria Armida

texts.es:
Gloria, de 48 años de edad, es emprendedora y con deseos de salir adelante, está soltera, pero vive con sus tres hijos.

Gloria, se dedica a la venta de ropa de diferentes marcas y diferentes estilos, no tiene un puesto fijo y es por eso que viaja todos los días, a diferentes lugares a comercializar sus productos.

Gloria, necesita el crédito para poder comprar más mercancía y así ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes y también con la visión de mejorar sus ingresos y crecer comercialmente.

Los planes de Gloria, son continuar trabajando y obtener buenas ganancias, para poder conseguir un local fijo y establecer su negocio de manera formal.
texts.en:
Gloria is 48 years old, enterprising, has the desire to get ahead, and is single but lives with her three children.

Gloria works in the sale of clothing of different brands and styles, and doesn't have a set location so she travels every day to different places to sell her products.

Gloria needs a loan to be able to purchase more merchandise and that way offer a larger selection to her customers, with an eye also on raising her income and expanding commercially.

Gloria's plans are to continue working and obtain good profits, to be able to acquire a permanent location and officially establish her business.

loans.use: To be able to purchase more merchandise.

loans.name: Ilma Yaneth

texts.es:
Ilma, de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada y vive con su pareja y su madre, aún no tiene hijos y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura y su madre le ayuda con los oficios domésticos y con su negocio.

Ilma, es una mujer emprendedora, se dedica a la venta de frutas, se levanta muy temprano y sale a vender la fruta preparada por todo el pueblo, tiene un año y medio de dedicarse a esto.

Ella desea mejorar su negocio, es por eso que solicita el crédito para comprar más fruta para vender, ya que ha observado que ese negocio es bueno y que es rentable.

Ella sueña con tener un local o un lugar más adecuado, para establecer un negocio más grande y ofrecer mejor calidad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ilma is 30 years old, went to school up until the 9th grade, is in a relationship and lives with her partner and mother. She doesn't have children yet and her partner works in agriculture, while her mother helps by doing housework and assisting her with the business.

Ilma is an enterprising woman who works selling fruit. She gets up very early and heads out to sell prepared fruit throughout the whole town. For a year and a half she has been doing this.

She wants to improve her business, and that's why she's applying for a loan to purchase more fruit to sell, since she has observed that business is good and it's profitable.

She dreams of having a store or a more appropriate location, to establish a bigger business and offer higher quality products to her customers.

loans.use: To purchase more fruit to sell.

loans.name: Look Up Group

texts.en:
From Accra, three people are part of the Look Up Group. The people are focused on transforming their lives through empowerment, small loans and education. They have a vision of raising their standard of living and creating a more prosperous future for themselves and their families. 

Comfort is a single parent member of this group. She is a 53-year-old and sells wholesale eggs. Comfort wants to continue to support her one child's education. She buys eggs at the production price and sells to customers at the wholesale price. She always learns something new and useful through ID-Ghana's program, which enhances the members' lives and businesses. 

Members of this group know how to read or write and so the educational training sessions are essential to their success as caretakers of their family members and business entrepreneurs. The training is given in the indigenous language of the women, often with pictures, and covers a variety of subjects including effective business management practices, nutritional and health tools, and self-esteem.

loans.use: To buy eggs at the production price and sell to customers at the wholesale price.

loans.name: San Jose Group

texts.es:
El presente comité se encuentra, en el ciclo número 10 del programa de comité de mujeres, se puede comentar la vida de la señora  Pelagia ella se dedica a la venta de gallinas caseras, ropas, cosméticos y colchas.
 A través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, pero igualmente está consciente de que este trabajo y esfuerzo que está haciendo debe ser continuo y permanente para lograr un éxito total. Ella es una mujer muy sacrificada y luchadora que quiere salir adelante para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de ropas y cosméticos variados, para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo, y seguir ayudando a su familia con sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This existing committee is in its 10th loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. One woman who deserves mentioning is Sra. Pelagia, who sells home-cooked chicken, clothes, cosmetics, and quilts.

Pelagia is improving her poverty situation through her efforts, her continuous work, and by applying the vital behaviors of successful women. She is aware that her work and effort must be permanent and continuous in order for her to achieve complete success. Pelagia is a self-sacrificing and determined woman who wants to move forward so that she can help her family.

She is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the purchase of clothes and various cosmetics in order to continue her sales just as before. As a result, she can continue helping her family with her earnings.

loans.use: to buy clothes and various cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a sewing machine for his business

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer De Mollepata Ii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER DE MOLLEPATA II”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Mollepata, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Lourdes, la socia continua con su negocio de crianza de animales menores como gallinas, cuyes entre otros, la socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido, la socia continua criando a sus animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de gallinas entre otros.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de crianza de ganados, negocio de venta de animales, artesanía.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “NUEVO AMANECER DE MOLLEPATA II” communal bank. This bank is located in Mollepata district, in Anta province, Cusco department. 

Lourdes continues with her business raising small animals such as chickens and guinea pigs, among others. She is grateful to those taking part in her dream through this loan and is committed to paying it back on time.  She wants to be able to continue raising and selling her animals to customers. She is a responsible, enterprising person who earns an income this way to support her family.

She is requesting a loan to buy chickens and other animals.

The other members work raising cattle, selling animals, and traditional crafts.

loans.use: To buy chickens and other animals.

loans.name: Blanca Aura

texts.es: Blanca es una señora de 33 años de edad, Blanca esta casada y tiene 3 hijas de las edades de 12, 16 y 17 años de edad y se encuentran estudiando, el esposo de Blanca  se dedica al comercio de sabana s y muebles, Blanca  se dedica a la crianza de animales menores ya que esa es su fuente de ingresos y puede ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar y educación de sus hijos, Blanca necesita el dinero del crédito para comprar chanchos y de su negocio espera que le siga yendo bien para bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Blanca is a 33-year-old woman, she is married and has three children who are 12, 16, and 17 years old and go to school. Blanca's husband sells sheets and furniture. Blanca works raising small animals, and this is her source of income which she uses to help her husband with the household expenses and with the education of their children.

Blanca needs the loan to buy piglets, and she hopes that her business will continue to thrive, for the well-being of her children.

loans.use: to buy piglets.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina tiene 64 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge en el distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, la población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad tales como arroz, azúcar, leche, etc. Cuenta con más de 12 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será para invertir en campaña escolar, en la compra de útiles escolares para incrementar su negocio, con esto Paulina podrá aprovechar las ventas por esta campaña lo cual le generará mayores ingresos que le permitirán tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Paulina is 64 years old, her marital status is cohabitation, and she lives with her partner in the district of Pucara located in the Jaen province of the Cajamarca region in Peru's northern mountain range. Life in the district is peaceful, and the population primarily works in agriculture, commerce, and livestock.

She works selling essential products like rice, sugar, milk, etc. She has over 12 years of experience in this business and has very good personal and professional references in the area. The current loan is for investing in a school year sale by purchasing school supplies to increase her business. With this Paulina will be able to take advantage of the sales during this promotion which will generate more income and allow her to have a better standard of living.

loans.use: To invest in a school year promotion by purchasing school supplies to increase her business.

loans.name: Osbaldo

texts.es:
Osbaldo tiene 61 años de edad, es casado, vive con su esposa en el distrito de Santo Tomás, ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica al comercio y cría de animales menores como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros. Adicionalmente se dedica al cultivo de maíz y así mismo a la cría de caballos. Cuenta con 20 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será para capital de trabajo, compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para incrementar su negocio y para su posterior comercialización, con esto Osbaldo espera obtener mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Osbaldo is 60 years old, married, and lives with his wife in the Santo Tomás district, which is located in the Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in this district is quiet and the inhabitants mainly work in agriculture, trade, and livstock.

Osbaldo works in trade and raises small animals like chickens, ducks, turkeys, and others. In addition, he grows corn and breeds horses. He has 20 years of experience in this business and very good personal and work references in the area.

The loan will be working capital: he wants to buy more animals to expand his business and to sell them later. By this, Osbaldo hopes to obtain a higher income and by this to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to increase his working capital, to buy more animals in order to expand his business.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
Edilberto, de 46 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está casado y tiene 4 hijos.

Edilberto, tiene más de 20 años de dedicarse a la actividad pesquera, siendo uno de los pescadores más reconocidos de la zona; él disfruta mucho que sus hijos y su esposa, compartan con él esta actividad.

Edilberto, necesita comprar insumos para darles alimento a su crianza de pescado, pues asegura que cuando se acerca la semana santa, la venta de pescado tiene gran demanda.

Edilberto, sueña con poder comprar un motor para su canoa y así poder desplazarse más lejos en el rio, para pescar los peces más grandes y de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Edilberto, 46, never had the opportunity to get an education.  He is married and has four children.  He has over 20 years' experience in the fishing business and is one of the most well-known fishermen in the area.  He and his children, along with his wife, share in the business.

Edilberto needs to buy supplies for his fishing activity, since Easter holiday is near and there will be a high demand for fish.

Edilberto dreams about buying a motor for his canoe so he can fish further down the river for larger, better fish.

loans.use: To buy supplies for his fishing business.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Unidas está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están trabajando con  la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Rosalina quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha mejorado bastante su situación de pobreza. Ella es actualmente presidenta del comité se dedica a la venta de Lencerías dentro de su comunidad obteniendo su propio ingreso.
A través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de estas ventas está luchando para poder ir creciendo y mejorando.
La Sra. Rosalina  solicita este préstamo para la compra de lencerías, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group “Mujeres Unidas” (United Women) is in its first loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. All of the members are working and helping one another to move forward. They are working with the poverty elimination survey.

One of the members is Sra. Rosalina, whose latest survey indicated that she is at a Stage 3 poverty level. This means that she has greatly improved her poverty situation. She is currently serving as the president of the committee. Rosalina sells lingerie in her community as a way of generating her own income. Through her efforts and continuous work, she is making sales as she strives to grow and improve.

Sra. Rosalina is requesting a loan in order to buy lingerie. This will help to solidify her business plan, which will lead to an improvement in her earnings.

loans.use: to buy lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Marsel

texts.en:
Marsel is 67 years old and lives in the village of Ddmashen in the Gegharkunik region. Marsel now lives with his wife. Their son lives and works in the Russian Federation and from there he transfers money to his parents for their living. In the village, Marsel is engaged in farming and agriculture. Before, he used to work in different workshops as a welder, but now he does his best with the help of his wife, to develop his farming. On his farm he has cows, a calf, heifers, pigs, sheep, beehives and a lot of chickens.  As Marsel says, work about his farm is a lot, so the whole day is not enough for him to finish his planned work. His plot of land makes not a small part of that work, as it very large and here he cultivates potatoes (he sells them to re-sellers). Marsel works very cutely and is organized. The first part of the day he devotes to his farm cattle, and together with his wife, cleans the barn and farm cattle. His wife milks the cows and the sheep, makes very tasty cheese and macun from the milk (a national dairy product), and collects eggs for sale. The second part of the day is the period of land cultivation. All the farm products his wife sells locally to their neighbors and villagers. 

Marsel asks for this loan as he needs to buy potato seedlings, fertilizer and animal fodder for his farm cattle. He will be very thankful if Kiva lenders support him in his request.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings, fertilizer and animal fodder for his farm cattle

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a married man. He has five children. He describes himself to be humble. He operates a farm where he keeps dairy cows and grows vegetables. He has been involved in this business for 23 years. His business is located in an area with good rainfall and his primary customers are individuals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy seed, fertilizer and other items. His business goal is to buy more cows within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will construct a greenhouse. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and other items

loans.name: La Gloria Group

texts.es:
La comunidad donde se ubica el grupo “La Gloria” se caracteriza por la elaboración de dulces típicos mexicanos como cocadas, jamoncillo, ajonjolí  y las llamadas “glorias” elaboradas con dulce de leche. Las integrantes del grupo se dedican a la venta de:

Rosa,  Elvira, Eva - Dulces 
Sandra - Comida 
Amalia - Frutas Y Verduras 
Flor, Zuleima - Ropa 
Rolando - Refrescos 
Ana,  Carmen - Cosméticos 
Irma -Antojitos 
María - Dulces Y Refrescos 

Doña Rosa es una mujer muy trabajadora, tiene 32 años de experiencia en la elaboración y venta  de dulces típicos. “Aprendí a elaborarlos desde los  18 años de edad y aprendí que cada dulce tiene su secreto. Mi mamá y mi abuela los hacían para ayudar a solventar algunos gastos ”. Y como ellas, Rosa ahora vende las golosinas en las comunidades más cercanas durante toda la semana después de que al principio fue un gran reto sobrepasar su seriedad y acercarse con mayor facilidad a las personas. 

Por las mañanas Rosa se dedica a hacer los quehaceres de su hogar y sale de casa a más tardar a las 10 am con bolsitas de dulces preparadas y no regresa a casa hasta las 4 pm ya sin bolsas. Hay días excepcionales en que no puede salir a vender y definitivamente no le agrada romper con su rutina que le permite salir a otros lugares, distraerse y tener su propio dinero. 

Rosa agradece mucho las oportunidades de financiamiento que ha recibido por parte de VisionFund y que como este nuevo préstamo le permitirá comprar más ingredientes para hacer sus dulces. Rosa comprará panela, ajonjolí, semilla de pipián, coco, piña, papel de estraza y bolsas plásticas para aumentar la producción.
